alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 12:36AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lincoln County through 130 AM MDT... At 1235 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles north of Troy, or 24 miles north of Libby, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain, localized flooding, pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flash flooding on streets and low lying areas. Locations impacted include... Yakt and Yaak. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 0 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
